words.source: H559 (אמר), HC/Vqw3ms (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3ms). KJV, ESV, NASB all render 'And God said'.
H430 (אֱלֹהִים), HNcmpa (noun-common-mp-absolute). KJV 'God', ESV 'God', NASB 'God'. All agree.
H4872 (מֹשֶׁה), HNp (proper noun). KJV, ESV, NASB all render 'Moses'.

H1961 (היה), HVqi1cs (Qal-imperfect-1cs). DIVERGENT: KJV 'I AM THAT I AM', ESV 'I AM WHO I AM', NASB 'I AM WHO I AM'. Some scholars render 'I will be what I will be' (future tense). The Qal imperfect can express both present and future aspects. This is one of the most theologically significant phrases in the Hebrew Bible.
H834 (אֲשֶׁר), HTr (relative particle). KJV 'THAT', ESV 'WHO', NASB 'WHO'.
H1961 (היה), HVqi1cs (Qal-imperfect-1cs). DIVERGENT: See note on position 5. The repeated אֶהְיֶה (Ehyeh) forms the divine self-disclosure אֶהְיֶה אֲשֶׁר אֶהְיֶה (Ehyeh Asher Ehyeh).
H559 (אמר), HC/Vqw3ms (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3ms). KJV 'And he said', ESV 'And he said', NASB 'And He said'.
H3541 (כֹּה), HD (adverb). KJV 'Thus', ESV 'Say this', NASB 'Thus'.
H559 (אמר), HVqi2ms (Qal-imperfect-2ms). KJV 'shalt thou say', ESV 'say', NASB 'you shall say'.
H1121 (בֵּן), HR/Ncmpc (preposition-lamed/noun-common-mp-construct). KJV 'unto the children of', ESV 'to the people of', NASB 'to the sons of'.
H3478 (יִשְׂרָאֵל), HNp (proper noun). KJV, ESV, NASB all render 'Israel'.
H1961 (היה), HVqi1cs (Qal-imperfect-1cs). DIVERGENT: KJV 'I AM', ESV 'I AM', NASB 'I AM'. Same verb as positions 5 and 7, now used as the divine name sent to Israel.
H7971 (שׁלח), HVqp3ms/Sp1cs (Qal-perfect-3ms/suffix-1cs). KJV 'hath sent me', ESV 'has sent me', NASB 'has sent me'.
H413 (אֶל), HR/Sp2mp (preposition/suffix-2mp). KJV 'unto you', ESV 'to you', NASB 'to you'.
